mapper.select: SELECT competence.* FROM employee INNER JOIN manager_roles ON employee.`id`=manager_roles.`employee_id` INNER JOIN roles ON roles.`id` =manager_roles.`role_id` INNER JOIN role_competence ON role_competence.`role_id`=roles.`id` INNER JOIN competence ON role_competence.`competence_id`=competence.`id` WHERE employee.`id`=#{param1};
